short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks the relevance between <h1> and <main> tags using OpenAI and Gemini API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extenshion helps check how well the main headline of a webpage (the <h1> tag) matches or relates to the main content of that page (inside the <main> tag). It uses an AI service from OpenAI and Gemini to understand and compare the meanings of the headline and the content to ensure they are relevant to each other. This is useful for improving a websiteâ€™s search engine optimization (SEO).
